message: I live in the Cayman Islands and I want to launch my first Django powered website. I want to monetize it, but I've hit a wall. I tired using paypal (yes i know they've got issues :)) but they only recently allowed users from the Cayman Islands to receive funds... and the catch is, it has to be an American bank account. So my question is how do I open one from overseas? Anyone have any advice?
you might want to take a look at google checkout too
I live in Belize, so i know your struggles, In the past i've used moneybookers and 2checkout.com

@rasiel Thanks! It's funny that a Belizean would reply, as I was born in Belize :D But grew up in Cayman. I've looked at google checkout but the same thing applies again, you need an american account or UK that is if you live in Cayman :( I just need a way to open the account from here then I'll be good.
Hey thats awesome, what part of Belize you originally from? PM me your email/chat, maybe we can chat a bit more.
